title: Nick Cave - The Ass Saw the Angel / Death of Bunny Munro
description:
NICK CAVE (b. 1957) is an Australian musician (best known as the lead singer of Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds) and a novelist.

His first novel, AND THE ASS SAW THE ANGEL (1989), tells the story of Euchrid Eucrow, a mute born to an abusive drunken mother and a father obsessed with cruel traps and animal torture.  With its Southern Gothic setting, critics have compared it favorably with novels by American authors William Faulkner and Flannery O'Connor.

THE DEATH OF BUNNY MUNRO (2009), his second novel, deals with a middle aged Lothario whose constant womanising and alcohol abuse comes to a head after the suicide of his wife.  He and his son go on an increasingly out of control road trip around Brighton, over which looms the shadow of a serial killer making his way towards Brighton, as well as Bunny's own mortality.


Both books are in ePUB format.

* AND THE ASS SAW THE ANGEL (Penguin, 1990)

* THE DEATH OF BUNNY MUNRO (Faber & Faber, 2009)
